books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher is thrown into jail on trumped-up charges and must clear his name.
books.name: NEVER GO BACK

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Sherrilyn Kenyon
books.description: Acheron and Styxx, his often-estranged brother, must learn to trust each other in this Dark-Hunter novel.
books.name: STYXX

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: Tatijana of the Dragonseekers encounters Fenris Dalka, who has returned to the Carpathian Mountains.
books.name: DARK LYCAN

books.author: by Melody Anne
books.description: Two years after Arianna Harlow walked away from him, Rafe Palazzo wants her back again. Volume 3 of the Surrender series.
books.name: SEDUCED

books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: A detective investigates a supermodel’s suicide; by J.K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE CUCKOO'S CALLING

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Thomas Perry
books.description: Sam and Remi Fargo, a husband-and-wife treasure-hunting team, discover a Mayan codex.
books.name: THE MAYAN SECRETS

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by  H.M. Ward
books.description: Jonathan, the youngest Ferro brother, re-encounters Cassie Hale three years after she broke his heart. Can they make a go of it again?
books.name: STRIPPED

books.author: by M. Leighton
books.description: In the conclusion to the Bad Boys series, the privileged Marissa is drawn to the sexy man who kidnapped her in a case of mistaken identity.
books.name: EVERYTHING FOR US

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: In a moment of desperation, Devon McAllister takes her daughter and flees to Thunder Point, Ore., where she meets the man who could heal her wounded heart.
books.name: THE HERO

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers. Originally published in 1985.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: When he begins to investigate a friend’s mysterious death, a man discovers she was leading a double life.
books.name: MISTRESS
